title: játszótérdoki.hu
description: Portfolio page for a hungarian company specified in renovating, repairing children's playground.

title: screenie
description: share your screenshots and videos easily (originally hypixel.lol)
extended_description: A ShareX screenshot uploader, with support for domain management, user management, Spotify now playing, public profiles and so much more! It is based on Sveltekit and AppWrite.

title: hypixel.lol
description: ShareX image uploader service, with Discord user integration!
extended_description: This is the 'legacy' version of screenie. It it based on NodeJS, Bootstrap.

title: cleangoogle.lol
extended_description: This is just a webpage, which 'redirects' you to google using the search query generated from your search. It features light/dark mode, current time, quotes on each load, and weather API.

title: shortify!
extended_description: A simple NodeJS app which generates a random hash, and assigns it to the original URL.

title: spotnow
description: User profile page with Spotify integration.
extended_description: A simple NodeJS app, which gets the currently playing song from the Spotify API, and renders it in a express view.

title: SnapScrape
description: Get your saved chat from Snapchat.
extended_description: A simple NodeJS app, which convert the JSON export from Snapchat to a chat like view.

title: Molnár Cukrászda
description: Molnár Cukrászda is a fictitious online bakery, a culmination project showcasing pastries and cakes in a digital space.
extended_description: This is one my 'school' a long time ago, based on Bootstrap, front-end only.

title: Molnár Cukrászda v2
description: This is a rewritten version of Molnár Cukrászda, including complete PHP and SQL.
extended_description: This version of the 'project' has DB annd PHP implementation

title: emojis.gg
extended_description: A simple webpage displaying all the emojis existing, and option to copy it with one click/touch.
